title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Adam Carolla on Will Smith/Chris Rock Oscars Slap, Uncomfortable Comedy, Athletes vs. Actors
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Adam Carolla on Will Smith/Chris Rock Oscars Slap, Uncomfortable Comedy, Athletes vs. Actors
description:
Colin is joined by comedian - and host of The Adam Carolla Show - Adam Carolla to discuss Will Smith's viral slapping of Chris Rock at the Oscars (4:00), why Adam's experience writing jokes at the Oscars makes him unsympathetic to Smith, if comedians should fear copycat attacks from angry fans (12:00), why people have become so scared of uncomfortable comedy is (19:00), how athletes mentalities differ from actors (25:00), and the pros and cons of getting into the political space (29:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
